about.title: What You Need to Know About DekuSMS
about.description1: is a secure, end-to-end encrypted, open-source SMS messaging application designed to keep your communication private and accessible.
about.description2: Built with privacy-conscious users and advocates of free communication in mind, DekuSMS ensures that no matter the circumstance, be it surveillance, censorship, or internet disruptions, you can still send and receive secure messages.

endToEnd.title: End-to-End Encrypted SMS Messaging
endToEnd.desc: DekuSMS ensures your SMS conversations remain private with robust end-to-end encryption, protecting your communication from interception or tampering.

cloudForwarding.title: Message Routing (Gateway Clients)
cloudForwarding.desc: Enable connectivity for others by acting as a gateway client. DekuSMS allows devices with internet access to securely route offline users' messages to online platforms, bridging the communication gap during internet shutdowns.

smsGateway.title: Message Forwarding to the Cloud
smsGateway.desc: Easily set up message forwarding from your Android device to your cloud infrastructure using specific server URLs. This ensures your messages are accessible and can be processed however you choose.

download.title: Download DekuSMS
download.subtitle: Secure, private, and open-source messaging at your fingertips. Get DekuSMS today on your favorite platform.

stayConnected.title: Stay Connected
stayConnected.subscribeText: Subscribe to get the latest updates and offers.

downloadpage.title: Download DekuSMS
downloadpage.subtitle: Get DekuSMS from your favorite source below. Open-source, privacy-respecting, and easy to install.
downloadpage.playstore_desc: Download DekuSMS directly from the Google Play Store for the easiest installation and updates.
downloadpage.fdroid_desc: Prefer open-source platforms? Install DekuSMS from F-Droid, a trusted repository of free and open-source apps.
downloadpage.opensource: View and download DekuSMS directly from GitHub. Access the latest releases and source code.
